display_long_description:
Welcome to "Hamster Inc."! It's a physics building game that supports "mixed reality". In this delightful puzzle game, you'll design, build, and then program machines to overcome challenges!

# Creativity and Logic
- Based on physical principles and logic, think about how to overcome obstacles and help hamsters improve transportation efficiency.
[media]

# Assembling
- Design and build a variety of machines with over 60 types of blocks.
- Over 20 special-function blocks that can be programmed, such as ultrasonic sensors, DC motors, radars and more.
[media]

# Graphical programming
- Super easy! Graphical programming makes your creations "alive"!
[media]

# Explore 6 unique themes
- Explore Eastern Forests, Automated factories, Sunshine Coast, Western Gobi, Volcanic Tunnels, and Northern snowfields.
- As you progress, develop your hamster company and unlock new resources and challenges.

# Enjoy the sandbox mode
- where you can build and program freely without any limitations on the block amount!
[media]

# Mixed Reality
Bring your creations into real world and transform the entire room into a dream paradise: 
- Create custom levels by using real furniture and virtual terrain models, 
- Have your car/drone automatically avoid furniture as it moves around the room,
- Watch virtual creatures interact with real world: like bison running on tables, floors, or beds!
[media]

Discord: https://discord.gg/NkC8bwQEmK
